channel.title: hnrss.org updates
channel.description: A feed announcing updates related to hnrss.org

item.title: New endpoints for Best, Invited, Active, and Launches
item.description:
• https://hnrss.org/best for the top recent vote getters
  • https://hnrss.org/invited for posts given a second chance by the mods
  • https://hnrss.org/active for posts with active, ongoing discussions
  • https://hnrss.org/launches for YC launches

item.title: hnrss.org now supports /bestcomments and /classic
item.description:
Two new endpoints have been added to hnrss.org:

  • https://news.ycombinator.com/bestcomments is a list of the highest-voted recent comments. You can obtain this feed from https://hnrss.org/bestcomments.
  • https://news.ycombinator.com/classic ranks posts only using votes from accounts created before Feb 13, 2008. You can obtain this feed from https://hnrss.org/classic.

item.title: hnrss.org now supports feeds of favorited posts
Hello World
item.description: Follow this feed for hnrss.org news and announcements.
